remarks: An element of a set is less than or equal to the least upper bound of the set.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2011.)
statement:
lublem.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lublem.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lublem.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
lubel $p |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ X e. S /\ S C_ B ) -> X .<_ ( U ` S ) ) $.
